products.product_description: Laryngeal Mirror Kit is presented as a set of laryngeal mirrors used for indirect laryngoscopy. The poster states: “The Laryngeal Mirror provides thermal-tactile stimulation during swallowing therapy. It helps trigger a swallow by stimulating the anterior pillars of faces. The Mirror can be sterilized by steam, hot air or antiseptic solutions.” The poster also describes, “Laryngeal Mirror: used for indirect laryngoscopy,” and mentions the structures that can be visualized, including the base of the tongue, vallecula, epiglottis, false vocal cords, and true vocal cords. The image shows multiple mirror sizes and an illustration of laryngoscopy using a mirror. The poster includes “FOR, ENT GP,” indicating intended clinical use areas. This product description follows the exact statements shown on the poster without adding additional claims. Pricing is not shown, so the price remains null.
